name: Amateur Dog Trainer
description: As a high school student, you were the only member of a canine training club.  You've always been into dogs, but you barely manage to get Fido to sit.  Unfortunately, you'll need to learn quick or you and Fido aren't going to last long in this new world.

name: Dog Fighting Breeder
description: You never cared for anything until you got caught up in a dog fighting ring.  You weren't really any good, but now there's no one else to be better than you.  Time to train some dogs to take down the newly undead!

name: Professional Canine Handler
description: You've been teaching dogs for all manner of things: movies, obedience, tricks, and sometimes fighting.  With all your experience and money, you're ready to take on the next step: the apocalypse!
